text: The Foreign Affairs Minister of the Palestinian National Authority is in charge of Palestine's foreign relations. In June 2006, Israel attacked the ministry's office in Gaza City twice. The attacks were in response to the capturing of an Israeli soldier just weeks before. ==List of Foreign Ministers (2003–present)== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" ! !
